name: Temples Of Tokyo [Private Tour]
description:
In Japan we say “smaller is better”. Let’s see if that’s true! Camera on hand, take a closer look at the famous temples and shrines of Tokyo. Train your eyes to focus on details. You’ll be amazed at how much you can discover once you pause and zoom in.

On “Temples of Tokyo” Photo Tour, you’ll bring your camera into Shinto shrines and Buddhist temples. We’ll show you how to take the postcard photo of course but we’ll go deeper. We’ll take you to famous locations and lesser known, yet not to be missed, hidden spots. We’ll give you insiders spot recommendations and composition tips. You will also learn how to use your camera’s aperture settings to enhance your photos.
